items.strItemDescription: This helm was forged from the same materials used in making the DragonLord armor. It was designed to strike the same fear and awe into the Dragonlord's foes. Then Cysero coated it with reflective paint, and now it will match your armor!

This helm was forged from the same materials used in making the DragonLord armor. It was designed to strike the same fear and awe into the Dragonlord's foes. Then Cysero coated it with reflective paint, and now it will match your armor!

A relic from an exotic land. Combined with it's matching weapon and helm, the set increases your damage against dragons.
It's time to kick some monster butt!
You have a giant goldfish on your back!
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
No man in black will be able to evade you now.
Exceptionally evil... but very roomy in the ears.
The latest in clockwork headwear!
The far north is a harsh wasteland. This will help to protect you from the ice storms that never seem to end.
Forged from a cursed metal found only in the far north. This crown shows that you are ruler over any undead that crosses your path.
No man in black will be able to evade you now.
A relic from an exotic land. Combined with it's matching weapon and cape, the set increases your damage against dragons.
This visor will help you see as you patrol the vast digital timescape!

This visor will help you see as you patrol the vast digital timescape!
This visor will help you see as you patrol the vast digital timescape! It'll also help you track down your target. No one evades the TK.0!
These wings are formed from cursed ice. They won't shatter no matter how hard they are struck.

Once upon a time, a great crusader of the Light donned this mantle; its brilliant glowing wings blinded his enemies with the power of truth and justice! Its strength is now yours!
Once belonging to a famous paladin, it is said that a single gaze from this helm will obliterate shadow itself; no darkness is safe from its vigilance! It's fully awakened power is now yours!
A relic from an exotic land. Combined with it's matching weapon and cape, the set increases your damage against dragons.
This helm was discovered in the nether regions of the abyss. It was said to give the power of Belial to those willing to wear this evil helm.

The official helm of the Zirkonnin Royal Guard. Now with 25% more Zirkkonium.

The healing powers of this helm help to stave off the Reaper.
The dark mending magics contained in this hat make it possible to ward off death, if you're resourceful enough.

This helm exudes the chilly aura of death.
The cloth of this hood is made from a special blend known only to the Ice Elves.

Exceptionally evil... but very roomy in the ears.
This helm is the type worn by the elite Guardians of legend. The style is a little outdated but its power is undeniable.
The latest in clockwork headwear!
No man in black will be able to evade you now.
No man in black will be able to evade you now.
These wings mirror the color of your armor's trim to create a stylish accessory!
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
These wings come from a bird which only rises out of Chaos! Can you imagine what it feeds its nestlings?!
This dusky cape is the official wear for Necromancers everywhere.
A relic from an exotic land. Combined with it's matching weapon and helm, the set increases your damage against dragons.
A relic from an exotic land. Combined with it's matching weapon and cape, the set increases your damage against dragons.
This mysterious cowl with hide your features from the burning day-star and protect your sinuses from excessive bone dust.
Bow Chicka WOW WOW!
These wings are the type that the heralds of love wear as they fly around and snipe unsuspecting prey with their love arrows. They normally grant the power of FLIGHT... but you're too big.
These wings really spice up your outfit!
This hat is awesome, so awesome it keeps your head warm and keeps those pesky spells from melting off your face too much, Plus you look like a huge chicken!
Rice pickers used to wear this hat in the ole' days. Now it just looks cool and is featured in many asian flicks. Usually awesome fighting type people wear it. You are probably not worthy.
This helm is the type worn by DragonMasters. While not as powerful as a full DragonLord, DragonMasters are still known the world over for their fierceness and strength.

This style of helm was worn many centuries ago by the pages and servants of Guardians. The style was later adopted by other heroes and now can be worn by anyone, but it still has strong ties to its Guardian heritage.
Chicks dig scars! Show what a truly invincible hero you are by sporting these stylish arrows. You're too busy being heroic to pull them out of your back.
This back piece shows that you're a true predator and that you can smell one drop of blood in one thousand gallons of water (smell power not included)
This is no ordinary paper bag with holes cut into it. This, my friend, is a MAGIC paper bag with holes cut into it.
Yeah, sure, you're wearing melon on your head, but look at it this way... if you get hungry you can eat your hat. This helm provides VERY good protection against water attacks.

This helm was found on a battlefield after the battle had ended. No one knows who was fighting or what the battle was about. All that is known is that this helm gives amazing strength to any whom wear it.
This sturdy helmet is the type that the dwarven nations often outfit their soldiers in. If your neck is strong enough to support it, then you have earned the right to wear it!

Long ago there was an order of paladins who swore an oath to recover the strongest elemental light artifacts on Lore and return them to their keep. in many cases, only their helms returned from this dangerous journey.
Fashioned in the style of the dragon guards, this helm was made to represent draconic superiority, and worn by dragons in human form during battle.
This helm is designed to deflect blows from oncoming lances during a joust. It would also be great headgear for a human cannonball.
The strange ninja warrior Guyshimitsu lost this helm during this third mission, only to replace it with an even more bizzare and terrifying helmet.

Long ago there was an order of evil knights who swore to defend the worlds most powerful elemental dark items from all danger. These knights attempted to keep light balanced with darkness, but these knights became lost to the dark.
These wings were fashioned by faeries for a hero among their people. Somehow they got lost in her laundry and ended up here.
These enchanted wings move and stretch like a real dragon's wings do. They have been enchanted with a live of their own using an experimental mixture of human and dragon magics.
